data.text: @bouldercohealth Right after the mask mandate was removed... sounds like the mask had no effect like we all knew. They better never come back.

@DeborahFarkas Hi, @deborahfarkas. Under-reporting is always assumed. Our surveillance systems: cases, testing, hospitalizations, vax rates, etc., are all used to inform overall trends & risks in the community. Local trends are improving & risk in the community is now relatively low.

@DeborahFarkas @bouldercohealth If you look at the new metric, tests /cases are not part of the equation… only hospitalizations & icu use. As a result we have high transmission and low rating (bc hospitalization is down). It’s very misleading. If your the cautious type, look at both metrics (and keep masking).
@ElsieKathryn4 @bouldercohealth Unelected lab coat tyrants with no souls
@bouldercohealth All this time we here at a "high" level. Couldn't tell, from the light touch on information and public health.
@bouldercohealth Oh my god your incompetence knows no bounds.
